name: Figma Catan
description:
Play Settlers of Catan remotely with your friends!

---

Inspired by my desire to play Catan with my friends during Coronavirus quarantining, I created this Catan visualization so we could video call each other but still see the same board on our screens.

Instructions for how to set up the game are in the file. Each person you play with will still need their own physical Catan game to manage their cards and dice. 

Have fun!
